discussion_comments.comment_body:
Have you tested your package on production?

You set `main: "index.js"` in your [package.json](https://github.com/hexrcs/ink-ascii/blob/master/package.json#L5) but your main file is `dist/index.js`.

discussion_comments.comment_body: Sorry about that, I'm very new to library authoring. Thanks for pointing it out and fixing it!
Is it possible to skip `targets` to make the config shorter? Also, could you use tabs here, not spaces?

if you want something that works, in node, this is the most reliable way to do it.
https://babeljs.io/docs/en/babel-preset-env#targetsnode
happy to add this
https://prettier.io/docs/en/options.html#tabs
Nope, no need to add prettier, you can just convert spaces to tabs by hand.
